title: BRIEF-Unisplendour's shares to halt trading pending asset restructuring
text:
BRIEF-Unisplendour's shares to halt trading pending asset restructuring Sept 28 
Sept 28 Unisplendour Corp Ltd 
* Says its shares to halt trading from Sept 29 pending asset restructuring plan 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1KFuBK4 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
